title: Pixel 2 xl - daydream not working anymore
content:
Hey, so before the newest android version I used to be able to cast from daydream to my tv no problems. Chromecast ultra. And also to my Nexus player. Since the new update I can cast but there is not picture. Just lines, artifacts, 
Glitching. Similar to a bad signal on an old crt tv. I've tried restarting phone. Chromecast ultra, Nexus player. But still doing it. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
